text: Approval for the pas champion(tm) hp (high pressure) ptca catheter with the following balloon sizes: 3.0 mm, 3.5 mm, 4.0 mm diameters with 15 mm and 20 mm lengths. this device is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
